User - Class in com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.model
Represents the program user with his features like nickname and email needed to register and personal informations useful for the purposes of the program.
User(String) - Constructor for class com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.model.User
Class first constructor that instantiates an user with only his email and empty maps of weights and mails.
User(String, String, LocalDate, int, float, Diet, Gender) - Constructor for class com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.model.User
Class second constructor that instantiates an user with nickname, email, birth date, height, weight, the type of diet he wants to follow and the gender
UserAlreadyInDatabase - Exception in com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.exception
The UserAlreadyInDatabase class is an Exception thrown when a signup request is made using an already registered email.

The constructor of the exception.
UserNotFound - Exception in com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.exception
The UserNotFound class is an Exception thrown when a provided token doesn't load to any existing user inside the local ore remote database.
UserNotFound(String) - Constructor for exception com.univpm.po.NutritionStats.exception.UserNotFound
The constructor of the exception.
